variants.Description in input context: This variant introduces a glycine to aspartate substitution in the SOD1 protein.

Material used.Description: Fibroblasts were cultured from skin biopsies obtained from ALS patients under informed consent.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_000434.4:c.1495A>G significantly decreased SOD1 mRNA levels compared to control fibroblasts.

Biological replicates.Description: Each experiment was performed with fibroblasts from three independent ALS patients.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate for qRT-PCR.

Basic positive control.Description: Fibroblasts from healthy donors were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No-template controls were included in the qRT-PCR reaction.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare SOD1 mRNA levels between ALS and control fibroblasts.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: SOD1 mRNA expression within the range observed in fibroblasts from healthy donors.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: SOD1 mRNA levels less than 50% of those observed in fibroblasts from healthy donors.
